subject: Big Brown (Race Horse)
Horse Racing
Preakness Stakes
Kentucky Derby
Horses
lead_paragraph: Big Brown, the winner of the Kentucky Derby, pulled away to win the Preakness Stakes, the second leg of racing’s Triple Crown, and became the first horse to win both races since 2004.
snippet: Big Brown, the winner of the Kentucky Derby, pulled away to win the Preakness Stakes, the second leg of racing’s Triple Crown, and became the first horse to win both races since 2004.
